text: Any objections to merging <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/29781|https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/29781> early? The package name is `SMARTAppLaunch.jl`
Any reason you need it now? Personally I think it looks a bit weird that registry maintainers gets a free pass from waiting 3 days

elements.text: Any reason you need it now? Personally I think it looks a bit weird that registry maintainers gets a free pass from waiting 3 days

text:
Yeah I'd like to deploy it as part of an app in a staging environment.

But I agree it might be better to just leave it open for the three days as a matter of fairness.

text: Pkg makes it trivial to add packages by URL so it shouldn't be a problem really
